title: What is the connection between the mind and body in terms of magnetism and how can it be used to promote healing?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the importance of a good flow of magnetism in the body for better health. The author explains that when the functions of the mind and body are not disturbed, the main movements should be directed towards the nerves of the vessels, which always allow for better blood circulation, resulting in greater activity and resolution. If blood flow is disrupted, as in fevers and congestions, passes should be performed locally. The text also discusses the difference between health and disease from a magnetic perspective, the importance of mental work, and the functions of different areas of the brain. Additionally, the text aims to explain the causes and effects of inflammation, and the connection that exists between the body and the soul. Lastly, the text covers various topics, such as the role of the spleen in nerve function, the difference between electricity and magnetism in the body, and the relationship between the hair and magnetism. Overall, the text delves into a unique perspective on the nature of health and well-being.

Personne est complétement saine, mais ça ne signifie pas que personne puisse dévenir plus saine. - de quoi a-t-on besoin pour une bonne courante de magnètisme? Après meme le pouls et le battement cardiaque peut changer, comme si une matière étrange était entré dedans. Et on voit ce changement dans les mots et pensées - est-ce que le comportement excité est comparable au comportement de l'inflammation? Surement.
last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the principles of magnetism and its effects on the body can lead to improved health and well-being.
